The CVS Repository

You can get access to the public CVS repository at SourceForge.net.

If you are not familiar with CVS and how it works, please read its brief overview at SourceForge.net: http://sourceforge.net/cvs/?group_id=42020.

Then, if you have a CVS client installed, use the following commands to get the Anti-Grain Geometry sources:


cvs -d:pserver:anonymous@vector-agg.cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/vector-agg login 
 
cvs -z3 -d:pserver:anonymous@vector-agg.cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/vector-agg co agg-2.4

Here agg-2.4 is the CVS module name.

You can also browse the repository directly:
http://vector-agg.cvs.sourceforge.net/vector-agg/agg-2.4/
